name: book-search-engine
description: The MERN Book Search Engine is a fully functioning search engine built with a RESTful API and originally developed using the MERN stack. The search engine uses the Google Books API and includes a React front end, MongoDB database, and Node.js/Express.js server and API. The app has been refactored as a GraphQL API using Apollo Server.

scripts.start: concurrently 'cd ./server && npm run dev' 'cd ./client && npm start'
